nodes.text: The TR-62 Autocushion Tripod was a tripod manufactured by BlasTech Industries to support their E-Web heavy repeating blaster cannon.

The TR-62 Autocushion Tripod was first mentioned in The Essential Guide to Weapons and Technology, a Star Wars Legends reference book released on November 4, 1997. The TR-62 Autocushion Tripod was first mentioned in the new Star Wars Canon in Blasters and Firearms, a reference book published exclusively in France by Altaya on February 23, 2021.
